verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> as <S%G4012>touching<s%> things offered unto <S%G1494>idols<s%>, we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2192>we<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge<s%>. <S%G1108>Knowledge<s%> puffs <S%G5448>up<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G3618>edifies<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1380>think<s%> that he <S%G1492>knows<s%> any <S%G5100>thing<s%>, he <S%G1097>knows<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G3764>yet<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> he <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G1097>know<s%>.

As <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G1035>eating<s%> of those things that are offered in sacrifice unto <S%G1494>idols<s%>, we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> an <S%G1497>idol<s%> is <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> there is <S%G3762>none<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1487%G99999>but<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%>.

<S%G235>But<s%> to <S%G2254>us<s%> there is but <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, the <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> are all <S%G3956>things<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> are all <S%G3956>things<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G235>But<s%> there is <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> every <S%G3956>man<s%> that <S%G1108>knowledge<s%>: <S%G1161>for<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> with <S%G4893>conscience<s%> of the <S%G1497>idol<s%> <S%G2193>unto<s%> this <S%G737>hour<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> it <S%G5613>as<s%> a thing offered unto an <S%G1494>idol<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G772>weak<s%> is <S%G3435>defiled<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1033>food<s%> <S%G3936>commends<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G5315>eat<s%>, are we the <S%G4052>better<s%>; <S%G3777>neither<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>, are we the <S%G5302>worse<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> take <S%G991>care<s%> lest by any <S%G3381>means<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1849>liberty<s%> of <S%G5216>yours<s%> <S%G1096>becomes<s%> a <S%G4348>stumblingblock<s%> to <S%G3588>them<s%> that are <S%G770>weak<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1492>sees<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> which <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> sit at <S%G2621>food<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1493>idol<s%>'s temple, <S%G3618>shall<s%> <S%G3780>not<s%> the <S%G4893>conscience<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%> which <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G772>weak<s%> be <S%G3618>emboldened<s%> to <S%G2068%G99999>eat<s%> those things which are offered to <S%G1494>idols<s%>;

<S%G1355>Therefore<s%>, <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1033>food<s%> <S%G4624>causes<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> to <S%G4624>stumble<s%>, I will <S%G5315%G99999>eat<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G2907>flesh<s%> <S%G1519>while<s%> the world <S%G165>stands<s%>, <S%G3361>lest<s%> I <S%G4624>cause<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G4624>stumble<s%>.
